short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: With PaywallUnblock, you can download millions of scientific articles
short.de: PaywallUnblock gibt Zugriff auf wisschenschaftliche Artikel, Paper, und PDFs
short.es: PaywallUnblock te ayuda a descargar ensayos académicos
short.ko: PaywallUnblock 다는 논문 다운로드를 지원해 드립니다.
short.zh_CN: PaywallUnblock 帮您下载研究论文

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access full text of scholarly articles as you browse with tiny_isotope — PaywallUnblock Pro. 

As you browse the web, tiny isotope searches the entire web automatically for legal, free, full-text open PDF versions of the paper. 

tiny_isotope uses university websites, open access repositories, author websites, government servers, and many other places to find legal free versions of papers. 

If you love OA.mg, Unpaywall, Kopernio, and Science then tiny_isotope is for you.
